casebody.data:
James LOCKARD and Mary Lockard, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
MAYCO INTERNATIONAL, LLC and Alpha to Omega Properties, LLC, Defendants-Appellees,
and
Tee Dee Enterprises, LLC, Defendant. SC: 159358
COA: 341808 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 17, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the Michigan Building and Construction Trades Council to file a brief amicus curiae is GRANTED. The revised amicus brief submitted on May 16, 2019, is accepted for filing.
